value.string:
"""Update customer informations"""
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 person = portal.ERP5Site_getAuthenticatedMemberPersonValue()
 person.edit(
 last_name=last_name,
 first_name=first_name,
 career_subordination_title=career_subordination_title,
 default_email_text=default_email_text,
 default_telephone_text=default_telephone_text,
 default_address_street_address=default_address_street_address,
 default_address_zip_code=default_address_zip_code,
 default_address_city=default_address_city,
 )
 
 # return context.WebSection_viewNextStep()
 session = context.WebSection_getVifibSession()
 params = portal.portal_selections.getSelectionParamsFor('vifib_session_id')
 instance_software_release_uid = params['instance_software_release_uid']
 service_title = params['service_title']
 software_release = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(uid=instance_software_release_uid)
 
 person.requestSoftwareInstance(
 software_release=software_release.getUrlString(),
 software_title=service_title,
 instance_xml="""<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <instance>
 <parameter id="nbd_ip">2a01:e35:2e27:460:e2cb:4eff:fed9:48dc</parameter>
 <parameter id="nbd_port">1024</parameter>
 </instance>
 """,
 )
 
 message = context.Base_translateString("Your instance is under creation. Thank you for using ViFiB!")
 return context.getWebSiteValue().Base_redirect(keep_items={'portal_status_message': message})
